SetConsoleCommand.description:
DBUTTON [Client] Sets a console command to be called when the button is clicked. This overrides the button's DoClick method.

[string] command
  The console command to be called.

[string] args
  The arguments for the command.

SetDisabled.description:
DBUTTON [Client] 

[boolean] disable
  true to disable the button, false to enable it.

SetEnabled.description:
DBUTTON [Client] 

[boolean] enable
  true to enable the button, false to disable it.

SetIcon.description:
DBUTTON [Client] 

[string] img=nil
  The image file to use, relative to /materials. If this is nil, the image background is removed.

SetImage.description:
DBUTTON [Client] 

[string] img=nil
  The image file to use, relative to /materials. If this is nil, the image background is removed.

UpdateColours.description:
DBUTTON [Client] 

[table] skin
  A table supposed to contain the color values listed above.
